item.title: PhonePe SmartSpeaker
item.description:
The PhonePe SmartSpeaker provides instant payment confirmation to merchants at their stores in 11 languages.

I led the product launch, and built the foundational experiences that enabled PhonePe to scale rapidly on the field. These include procurement and warranty terms, design of device behaviour and firmware update mechanisms, inventory management and deployment experience for a field team of 7k+ agents, and device management experience design for the end merchants.

I worked with a wide array of platform as well as vertical teams on this project to deliver this on a tight timeline, enabling a deployment of 4 Million devices in a year.

item.title: PhonePe POS
item.description:
The PhonePe POS is a Point-of-Sale device to receive payments in small retail stores easily. It allows customers to make proximity payments over BLE, without needing Internet infrastructure at the store. The POS works like a calculator, and payments can be accepted by pressing just one button.

The POS is designed on top of the calculator interface to make it extremely easy for merchants to learn and use. Trustworthiness, simplicity, ease of use and low cost were important values in the design process.

item.title: DooButton
item.description:
DooButton is a big Red Internet connected button that will ping a web server if you press it. It will toggle on or off based on its previous state. It behaves like a “Call attendant” button in an airplane. The web server it connects to can be customised.

The DooButton can be used in museums, restaurants and other interactive installations.

item.title: Breathing Mood Lamp
item.description: OLTRA (One Lamp to Rule Them All) is a Breathing Mood Lamp that breathes to help you relax and lights up with any color you want. It can be powered off a power bank, a computer or a wall plug, and it can be easily carried around too. The user can color it according to their mood, by simply turning a knob. It can be used as a table lamp, a ceiling lamp, a lantern or a Halloween pumpkin !
